channel.title: Will-o-Wisp Sound/flash
channel.description:
Can we make Will-o-Wisps more noticeable , had a few game recently where princess have claimed will-o wisp to someone and that person has denied it . ( edit : both people turned out to be same faction etc )
Either the wisp is broken or people are not seeing it .
I am thinking maybe a bright white/yellow flash at end of turn maybe ( similar to heal green or red dead ) to show you have been wisped and maybe also a sound effect .
